comment: Tried at Dan's Bicton tasting. Nice and spicy, rich and delicious. Very pricey at $500+, sampled it for a measly $4 token ah thankyou
I found the glenfiddich 12 and 18 very much one dimensional but this was certainly a few notches up similar to the medeira cask. Rich and elegant

While I'm not a huge fan of Glenfiddich (I find them too sweet) this is none the less a nice whiskey.
The price however is quite prohibitive, there are a lot of whiskey, in my opinion, that are much better, at a fifth of the price of this one.

No. 8 on my Glenfiddich journey. Great whiskey, one of those ones you just want to roll round and round your mouth. Vanilla, honey in spades. Now this is a ridiculously expensive whisky at $350USD. I really should take it down to 3 based on price but its better than that. Great way to finish off the tasting.

Woody, complex, finally a glenfiddich with age statement that tastes like a real scotch and 43abv. But for the price, this one is not really worth it. 

4.25/5
Sweet and smooth, like she is when u r on the beach.
Very good. Different from the other ones. The older Glenfiddich gets the more notes comes out!
very smooth and a little spicy
